content: Shares of SVB Financial Group   the parent of Silicon Valley Bank  could rise 25 percent in the next year due to higher interest rates  lower taxes and a revived initial public offering market  according to Barron's.
name: SVB Financial Group
title: SVB Financial shares could jump 25 percent in next year: Barron's

content: March 26 Shares of SVB Financial Group  the parent of Silicon Valley Bank  could rise 25 percent in the next year due to higher interest rates  lower taxes and a revived initial public offering market  according to Barron's.

title: SVB Financial shares could jump 25 percent in next year-Barron's
